product_name: Merrell Crush Glove Cross-Training Shoes - Women's
long_description: Light, flexible and minimalist, the Merrell Crush Glove cross-training shoes will help you reach the next level. Mesh uppers feature synthetic overlays for a glovelike fit with maxium breathability. Nylon mesh linings wick away moisture for all-day comfort. Compression-molded EVA midsoles feature a 0mm ball-to-heel drop and provide cushioning that makes outdoor adventures easy on your feet. Merrell Crush Glove cross-training shoes have nonmarking Vibram Chrysalis Glove rubber soles for excellent grip and durability. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan friendly.
short_description: Light, flexible and minimalist, the Merrell Crush Glove cross-training shoes will help you reach the next level.
